sections.text: Peabody’s Higher Education Administration M.Ed. trains professionals to shape policy, leadership, and student affairs in colleges and universities.

items: Electives in policy, finance, and diversity
sections.text: Students complete coursework in educational leadership and policy, plus internships in university and nonprofit settings.
Applicants must hold a bachelor’s degree and submit recommendations and statement; GRE is optional.
Graduates assume roles in student affairs, administration, and policy in higher education.
